description:
One rainy day Akagi learns from the captain of the Judo club, Aota, that the Judo club is plotting to recruit Hanamichi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Attention à toi Hanamichi. Le piège du judoka
Hanamichi in a Bind! The Judo Man`s Trap!
ฮานามิจิติดกับดัก! ของชมรมยูโด
花道ピンチ! 柔道男の罠
